alert.note: Alert for Bristol; Plymouth (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 08 at 10:07AM EDT until August 08 at 11:00AM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: The National Weather Service in Boston/Norton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Plymouth County in southeastern Massachusetts... Southern Bristol County in southeastern Massachusetts... Northeastern Washington County in Rhode Island... Newport County in Rhode Island... Bristol County in Rhode Island... * Until 1100 AM EDT. * At 1007 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Bristol to near Newport to Block Island, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. At 930 AM Conimicut Light reported a gust of 60 mph. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... New Bedford, Fall River, Warwick, Dartmouth, South Kingstown, North Kingstown, Newport, Bristol, Marion, Middleborough, Somerset, Portsmouth, Barrington, Middletown, Fairhaven, Narragansett, Swansea, Tiverton, Westport, and Warren. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
